name: Tumi's house
address: 2303 Park 1, Times City Park Hill, 458 Minh Khai street, Hai Ba Trung district, Hanoi, Hai Ba Trung District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set in the Hai Ba Trung district in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment is 1.8 km from Hanoi Creative City. The property features views of the pool and is 3.2 km from Hanoi Opera House. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

The kitchen features an oven and a microwave. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is available. Other facilities at Tumi's house include a fitness centre and outdoor pool.

You can play squash at the property, and bike hire is available. National Museum of Vietnamese History is 3.2 km from Tumi house, while Ba Dinh Square is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 25 km from Tumi's house.
